views.markdown:
1. Rewritten based on Ventana 2. Add iOS 10 Support 3. Fix passcode entry issues on iPad 4. Performance optimizations 5. Fix Siri display issues on iOS 7 - 9 1. Fix installation issues on iPads running iOS 9

1. Fix random crash from notifications on iOS 9.3.3
2. Add full iOS 9.3.3 support
Fix installation errors for some users on iOS versions older than 9.

1. Added support for iOS 9
2. Removed Classic Passcode view for all devices
3. Fixes Classic Mode on iPhone 6, 6+, 6s, and 6s+
1. Fixes crash when sliding notifications on iOS 8.3 and 8.4
2. Adds support for Atom
3. Adds support for JellyLock Unified
4. Fixes a bug with passcode handling in classic mode
Fix time : font weirdness if seconds is enabled in modern mode.

1. Modern Mode is now enabled by default. Switch it off in settings if you want Classic Mode.
2. Fixes Lock Screen Camera on iOS 8
3. Fixes Classic Notification Background on iOS 8

1. Fix issues where ClassicLockScreen would crash on certain lock screen wallpaper settings in modern mode

Fix iPad slider regression on previous update(s)

Fix some issues with Classic mode on iPhone 6 & 6+. (Still have to figure out the classic keypad issue though)

Add LockGlyph Support.

Adds BerryC8 compatibility. Add depedency for asset acquisition. 1. Fix Crash on iOS 8
2. Rewrite Media Controls to work on iOS 8
3. Fix Notifications on iOS 8
4. Add support for iPhone 6
5. Note: Camera Grabber support on iOS 8 will be coming soon.
FIx a crash that some users experienced.

1. Modern Mode! Get the best of both iOS 6 and iOS 7 with this modernized classic lock screen!
2. Add iPad support
3. Add support for Stride 2
4. Add support for AndroidLock XT
5. Add support for Forecast
6. Fix Media Control Bugs
7. Fix Touch ID Issues
8. Fix Wallpaper Scaling Bugs
9. Fix Camera Grabber
10. Fix a whole bunch of tweak conflicts
11. Fix Gesture issue on iOS 7.1.x.
